group_1.textLeft: Since they're talking to Sister, I was thinking...
they would get along at least a little, nyaa.
As hearts grow closer, people become more tolerant.@That in itself is true.
Even at the level of dialogue between nations, the@importance of relationships between leaders exists.
So, was Ryou Midori not caught today?

group_1.textRight: The message said she will come over@once her errands are done.
｜ Ryou went to the east to get a scoop, ｜
｜ and Hinano and Ikumi went to stop her. ｜

group_1.textLeft: I hope you don't mean the Mirrors offshoots, nyaa...

group_1.textRight: This ended up being a dark horse.
I know how you feel, but it's a double-edged sword.

group_1.textLeft: The moment she gets caught,@things will start to fall apart...

group_1.textRight: It will be a complete collapse.
Yeah, I hope she will be safe...

group_1.narration: Because even if you do good things,@your behavior can "easily break" your relationships.

group_1.textRight: It's been a while since we've gathered as friends,@but things have changed.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...I've always done things only for myself,
but now I can say I'm confident enough@to work hard for those "princesses"...

group_1.textRight: We'll take responsibility for all of our sadness@and crying here.

group_1.textLeft: We'll go to Juri's place and have a fresh start...

group_1.narration: We're weak because@we thought that if we kept clinging to others,@one day we would grow up a little.
But I think that we've been given strength@because we're working hard for someone@and supporting them.
So now we can be a little more positive,@a little stronger.
From now on,@we need to change into people that can stand on their own@and be the support that we wanted.
Even if we look inexperienced@from everyone's point of view,@even if the road we walk is twisted,@this is what we need right now.

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:"Huh? What I desire?@Like in the future?"]
[textBlack:"I don't really know,@career counselors just talk about@going right into high school..."]
[textBlack:"...I'm just a jerk, you know...?@I had to transfer schools@many times for protection.@I'm unsociable,@not even that cute, and@I hate being looked down on..."]
[textBlack:"Sometimes I unconsciously@do things to test Momoko.@I hate that part of me,@and feel like scum for it..."]
[textBlack:"And yet I'm afraid of@being separated,@so I'm also just selfish...@*Sigh*..."]
[textBlack:"But even for such an awkward girl,@Momoko...and Kaede...@they still want to be with me..."]
[textBlack:"These days, maybe Iroha too...@I can't say for sure,@but I can't believe that@Iroha wants to be friends..."]
[textBlack:"That's why...it may be impossible@to do more than a little at a time,@but I want to change,@and one day be able to@thank everyone without hiding away@or anything."]
[textBlack:"So, that's it,@maybe what I desire is@to be able to grow up together@with everyone..."]
